name: CUCKOLD'S GYM
description:
Description:

Step into a world of passion, deceit, and genuine emotions in "CUCKOLD'S GYM" – a captivating visual novel inspired by an intriguing story. In this story, you'll find yourself at the center of Chris life, whose idyllic existence is shattered when he discovers his wife's betrayal in the gym.
Explore emotional entanglements, make crucial decisions, and live through gripping moments that change the course of the narrative. Your influence on the story will determine its conclusion.

Corrupt and share...



Or fight...



Fulfill your deepest fantasies...


Key Features:

  • Deep Narrative: Dive into an intriguing story full of unexpected twists and secrets.
  • Interactive Storytelling: Your choices impact the events and relationships between the characters.
  • High-Quality Illustrations: Enjoy detailed depictions of emotions and events through quality illustrations.
  • Engaging Soundtrack: Discover the game's atmosphere with emotionally rich sound accompaniment.
  • Unveil a tale brimming with secrets and hidden desires in "CUCKOLD'S GYM" – a visual novel where every choice you make shapes the outcome.
